name: Match Gunner
description:
Ready? Aim... Fire!

Combining the demand for accuracy from shooters with the brain power needed to play match three games, Match Gunner provides either an interesting twist to the match three and/or shooter genre or an ultimate test of skill (both brains and brawn!)

- Move using the WASD keys

- Aim with the mouse. Right clicking will pick up the block you are aiming at while left click will fire your weapon.

- Don't let the match three tiles hit you, or you will DIE!

- Casual mode is available for those that want to play without the stress of death

- HARDCORE mode is there for those who truly want to test their strength.

Well, what are you waiting for? Have fun!

(Created for Ludum Dare 41)
